Title: Reasoning About Knowledge
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Sunday, 24-Nov-96 22:21:55 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 1924 Last-Modified: Monday, 30-Sep-96 18:16:00 GMT Reasoning About Knowledge Next: Reasoning About Uncertainty Up: Teaching Experience Reasoning About Knowledge (COM S 676): Course Description Reasoning about knowledge -- particularly the knowledge of agents who reason about the world and each other's knowledge -- was once the exclusive province of philosophers and puzzle solvers.
